title: The Oscars
article:
Did you watch the Oscars? Well, if you didn’t this is the right place for you! If you didn’t know, the Oscars are an academy award show where lots of celebrities and actors earn awards etc.

Oppenheimer won best film of the year!

Ryan Gosling obviously being Ken. Ryan (Ken) sang loud and proud the “I’m Just Ken” song from the Barbie movie!

It was a tight squeeze between Lily Gladstone or Emma Stone being best actor. The award went to Stone in the end.


Robert Downey Jr., best known for the role as Iron Man, won his first ever Oscar! Along with Christopher Nolan and Cillian Murphy!

Billie Eilish and FINNEAS the writers of the song ‘What Was I Made For?’ won best song!

For all of the Avatar fans! Congratulations! Avatar The Way of Water won best movie of the year!

To all of the ‘Nyad’ fans out there (including me), the lead actress Annette Bening was also awarded best lead role of the year!

Nimona, a great animated movie, was a hit! It won an Oscar for best animated feature!

That’s it for now, if you want to know more about the Oscars you could check it out!
author: Noa Kamil
